title: Batman: Dead to Rights
description: TV writer Andrew Kreisberg (Fringe, Simpsons, Vampire Diaries) and fan-favorite Batman artists Scott McDaniela nd Andy Owens explore the impact capturing and jailing super-criminals like The Joker had on the Gotham City Police Department and how far one officer goes off the deep end when faced with the new threats to his city. The ramifications of the "new kind of criminal" emerging in Gotham's early days is felt with deadly consequence...
author: Andrew Kreisberg
